frontier_signals: African tech transitioning from capital to institutionalization
Middle East investing $100B+ in dual hydrocarbon-renewable energy strategy
Southeast Asia developing regional AI governance frameworks
India shifting from foundational AI to applications and deep tech
Global wellness mainstreaming from luxury to necessity
Purpose-driven economy maturation with discipline over declaration
Climate tech entering execution phase with cost breakthroughs
Sub-Saharan Africa closing fintech-infrastructure gap; stablecoins key trend
key_discoveries.emerging_source_quality: 10 new sources identified, primarily Tier 2-3; several emerging as Tier 1 candidates with deeper coverage

methodology_notes.search_strategy: Systematic STEEPS + Region + 2026 keyword combinations with modifier variations
methodology_notes.deduplication: Cross-referenced against regular-sources.json to ensure novelty
methodology_notes.quality_filtering: Prioritized academic, international organizations, regional business media over blogs
methodology_notes.source_validation: Sources must have regular update frequency and demonstrable coverage depth

immediate_actions: Add 10 new sources to config/regular-sources.json for regular scanning
Prioritize NordForsk, Zawya, TechCabal for weekly deep dives
Monitor MENA startup acceleration and African fintech developments
Expand Portuguese/Spanish language news source coverage

Southeast Asia policy-specific coverage could be expanded beyond Philippines/Malaysia
